description: Related multi table for the Auth-Cert Avoidable Days Provider (I RFL 8514) item.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coverage for this referral record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PADS_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: Coverage level Possible Avoidable Days (PADS) Provider
